elements.contents:
The 5-sided node is rather complex. As the half-way point between the 4 and 6 sided node, it shares behaviour from both. When a circle containing a 5-side is activated, it will deconstruct a single object located at the direct center of the circle.
(continued on next page)

The elements generated from this deconstruction will be placed into any 5-sided nodes that fall in the same place that a construction node would need to be in to create something. I think I can use this to discover the configuration of items...
